Plot: Frank O'Brien, a petty thief, and his 7-year-long girlfriend Roz want to put an end to their unsteady lifestyle and just do that _last_ job, which involves stealing a valuable painting. ...
Title: Two If by Sea
Writer: Denis Leary (story), Mike Armstrong (story), Ann Lembeck (story), Denis Leary (screenplay), Mike Armstrong (screenplay)
Actors: Denis Leary, Sandra Bullock, Stephen Dillane, Yaphet Kotto
